content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Many populations exhibit the following growth curve:
content.question:
Organisms demonstrate exponential (r) or logistic (K) reproductive strategies. Explain these two strategies

and discuss how they affect population size over time.

frqParts.text:
Organisms demonstrate exponential (r) or logistic (K) reproductive strategies. Explain these two strategies

and discuss how they affect population size over time.
